cause.description:
Leave No Trace is the educational nonprofit making a difference today, by being a proactive solution to conservation.
Leave No Trace is all about people and the power we have to act as agents of change in the name of conservation, today. We're about getting people outside, but simultaneously empowering them to enjoy the outdoors in an environmentally sustainable way through minimum-impact skills and ethics.
Leave No Trace is a community of educated, passionate people who are doing the right thing for the outdoors today, and are developing tomorrow’s leaders of conservation.
As a member of this cause, you share our belief that responsible enjoyment and active stewardship of the outdoors by all people, worldwide, is the solution to protecting our cherished lands.
1. The Center will train a nation of outdoor advocates to put Leave No Trace principles into action.
2. Through relevant and targeted research, the organization will ensure the long-term health and sustainability of our natural world.
cause.mission: The Leave No Trace Center for Outdoor Ethics teaches people how to enjoy the outdoors responsibly.
cause.name: Leave No Trace
